verbose_text: Pt (IV) NP-cRGD with US promoted tumor cell apoptosis, notably by consuming GSH and highly enhancing the levels of ROS, further inducing Deltapsi m decreasing and releasing cytochrome c into the cytosol, activating caspase 9 and caspase 3 and finally activating tumor cell apoptosis.
